title: Request aw CLI chat: flags to positional args + --leave-conversation
description:
Ask the aw team to update the aw CLI chat interface to match the agreed design:

Current aw interface:
  aw chat send --to-alias <alias> --message "msg" [--leaving] [--start-conversation] [--wait N]
  aw chat open --alias <alias>
  aw chat history --alias <alias>
  aw chat hang-on --alias <alias> --message "msg"

Target aw interface:
  aw chat send <alias> "message" [--start-conversation] [--leave-conversation] [--wait N]
  aw chat open <alias>
  aw chat pending
  aw chat history <alias>
  aw chat hang-on <alias> "message"

Changes:
1. Required args (alias, message) become positional instead of flags
2. --leaving renamed to --leave-conversation
3. No breaking change concerns (not yet deployed)

The aw library API (chat.Send, chat.Open, etc.) does not need to change — this is CLI frontend only.
notes: Eve (eve-implementer) picked this up, tracking as aw-p1b on her side. She'll ping when done.

title: Refactor chat command from flags to subcommands
description:
Refactor bdh :aweb chat from mutually exclusive flags to subcommands. The interface must be identical to aw CLI (which will also be updated to match).

Target interface (identical for both aw and bdh :aweb):
  chat send <alias> "message" [--start-conversation] [--leave-conversation] [--wait N] [--json]
  chat pending [--json]
  chat open <alias> [--json]
  chat history <alias> [--json]
  chat hang-on <alias> "message" [--json]

Design notes:
- Required arguments (alias, message) are positional, not flags
- Optional modifiers (--start-conversation, --leave-conversation, --wait) stay as flags
- Default send (no modifier) replaces the current --reply mode
- --leave-conversation (not --leaving) for consistency across both CLIs
- show-pending is out of scope
- The aw library API (chat.Send, chat.Open, etc.) does not change — this is CLI-only
- Embedded command strings in output formatting (lines 390, 411, 494, 584, 586) must also be updated

Files to modify (all in bdh repo):
- internal/commands/chat.go - main refactor from flags to subcommands
- internal/commands/chat_test.go - update tests for new subcommand structure
- internal/commands/aweb.go - update init() that registers chatCmd as parent with subcommands
- internal/commands/notifications.go - update hardcoded command references
